prompts: Create a powerful fire-type Pokemon with wild orange fur and fierce eyes.
I want a muscular Pokemon with a flaming mane and an intimidating stance.
Generate a creature with bold colors and a strong presence, perfect for battles.
Make a fire-themed Pokemon that has a unique swirling design on its body.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon with fiery accents and a tough exterior.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and ferocity, with vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon that dominates the battlefield with its fiery spirit and robust build.
